name: crackflow
description: The framework of works about cracking password.

scripts.purge: rm -rf package-lock.json node_modules && npm run clean
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=dev PORT=3000 DEBUG=jike:game:* node dist/src/app.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=test DEBUG=crackflow:* ava --serial dist/test/statistic-test.js
scripts.cluster: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=crackflow:* node dist/src/flow/index.js
scripts.statistic: npm run clean && npm run compile && NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=crackflow:* node dist/src/statistic/vesrion-value.js

author: TalkWithKeyboard
